verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jehovah Jireh, my provider, His grace is sufficient for me, for me, for me.
Jehovah Jireh, my provider, His grace is sufficient for me, for me, for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My God shall supply all my needs according to his riches and Glory,
He'll give His angels charge over me,
Jehovah Jireh cares for me, for me, for me.
